dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fiercely and forcefully defend their position, potentially escalating the situation.
Your FarTwin will work to find common ground and negotiate a mutually beneficial solution.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data, weigh options, and make logical decisions based on evidence.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts, experience, and gut feelings to guide their decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin absorb and retain new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through images, videos, and visual aids.
Your FarTwin will learn best through listening to audio content, such as lectures or podcasts.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing, talkative, and enjoy being the center of attention.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key social settings and may need time alone to recharge.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves through writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be direct, to the point, and use few words to convey their message.
Your FarTwin will be lengthy, detailed, and use many words to explain their thoughts and feelings.

dimensions.label: Technology Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin is at ease with digital tools, software, and online platforms.
Your FarTwin may struggle with technology, feeling overwhelmed or intimidated by its complexity.

dimensions.label: Attention Span
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin focus their attention?

options.description: Your FarTwin has a brief attention span, easily getting distracted by new stimuli.
Your FarTwin can maintain focus for extended periods, allowing them to delve deeply into complex topics.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin relies on instinct and emotions to guide their decision-making process.
Your FarTwin carefully weighs options, analyzes data, and makes logical decisions based on evidence.
